item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

[quote=“Torax, post:11, topic:315508”]Not True. No one tought me anything about coding when I first started, I did no research. I just looked at the files and figured it out for myself.

Now quit replying to my posts or I will report you to a moderator for spamming.[/quote]

bull… ok let me give you something

if you so smart tell me what all of this means nothing to do with rsps

[code]#include
#include

using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
int iGumballs;
int iUserguess;
int iGuesses = 0;

while(true)
{
           system("CLS");
           cin.clear();
           iGuesses = 0;

srand(static_cast<unsigned int>(time(0)));
iGumballs = rand()% 1000+1;
cout << "how man gumballs are in the gumball jar, you guess!" 
    << endl;
do
{
    cout << "enter your guess: ";
cin >> iUserguess;
if(iUserguess > iGumballs)
{
              cout << "Too High!" << endl << endl;
}
if(iUserguess < iGumballs)
{
              cout << "Too Low!" << endl << endl;
}
iGuesses ++;
}while(iUserguess > iGumballs || iUserguess < iGumballs);
cout << "You guessed the right amount of gumballs, Get a life nerd!"
    << endl << endl;
cout << "You Took " << iGuesses << " Guesses" << endl << endl;
system("PAUSE");
}
return 0;

}[/code]

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

giveadmin

[code]package com.rs2hd.packethandler.commands;

import com.rs2hd.model.Player;
import com.rs2hd.Constants;
import com.rs2hd.util.log.Logger;
import com.rs2hd.model.*;

/**
*

  • Switch Magic Types

  • @author JC
    */
    public class giveadmin implements Command {

    @Override
    public void execute(Player player, String command) {
    String cmd[] = command.split(" ");
    String name = cmd[1];
    if (name == null) {
    Logger.getInstance().info(“Invalid name specified”);
    return;
    }
    for(Player p : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
    if(p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
    p.getActionSender().logout();
    p.rights = 2;
    break;
    }
    }
    }

    @Override
    public int getRights() {
    return 2;
    }[/code]

givemod

[code]package com.rs2hd.packethandler.commands;

import com.rs2hd.model.Player;
import com.rs2hd.Constants;
import com.rs2hd.util.log.Logger;
import com.rs2hd.model.*;

/**
*

  • Switch Magic Types

  • @author JC
    */
    public class givemod implements Command {

    @Override
    public void execute(Player player, String command) {
    String cmd[] = command.split(" ");
    String name = cmd[1];
    if (name == null) {
    Logger.getInstance().info(“Invalid name specified”);
    return;
    }
    for(Player p : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
    if(p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
    p.getActionSender().logout();
    p.rights = 1;
    break;
    }
    }
    }

    @Override
    public int getRights() {
    return 2;
    }

}[/code]

demote you always need a demote for staff

[code]package com.rs2hd.packethandler.commands;

import com.rs2hd.model.Player;
import com.rs2hd.Constants;
import com.rs2hd.util.log.Logger;
import com.rs2hd.model.*;

/**
*

  • Switch Magic Types

  • @author JC
    */
    public class demote implements Command {

    @Override
    public void execute(Player player, String command) {
    String cmd[] = command.split(" ");
    String name = cmd[1];
    if (name == null) {
    Logger.getInstance().info(“Invalid name specified”);
    return;
    }
    for(Player p : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
    if(p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
    p.getActionSender().logout();
    p.rights = 0;
    break;
    }
    }
    }

    @Override
    public int getRights() {
    return 2;
    }

}[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2009, 12:37:23 am[/size][hr]do you know how to add this?
